name: Project Avenger
tagline: This will be an automated triage script designed for Windows.  It is an updated version to my old Triage-IR program.
body:
### Goal
Project Avenger is built to use your favorite tools to collect information from a live host in aide of an investigation.

### Authors and Contributors
Mike Ahrendt has been a security professional for 5+ years.  With a focus on forensics and incident response.

### Support or Contact
If you're having issues please contact me @MikeAhrendt or michael.ahrendt@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
